title: Looking for ADC main to duo with Gold +
body:
Over not having a duo bot lane. Need a reliable, consisten adc duo, I can play support/mid fine, but prefer support. Have been losing a few games lately as Im trying to climb by playing mid lane as the adc's are always eh and its to difficult to carry from the support role without an ad, but just hasnt been working amazingly!

Add me! Skyla :D

replies.body: can't add you your friends list is full im down to duo
